title: The Obsidian Mountain Trilogy: The Outstretched Shadow, To Light a Candle, and When Darkness Falls
description: The Obsidian Mountain Trilogy by Mercedes Lackey and James Mallory consists of the VOYA Best Science Fiction and Fantasy novel The Outstretched Shadow, the USA Today bestseller To Light a Candle, and The New York Times bestseller When Darkness Falls; three entertaining adventure fantasies featuring elves, dragons, humans, and a very opinionated unicorn.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Mercedes Lackey
